programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Death of a Hero
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E04, A fire in January 2007 claims the life of WWII vet Bennie Angelo. A closer look at the crime scene reveals Bennie was dead before the fire, bumping an arson case up to homicide.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E05, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.
MST3K: The Christmas Dragon, 20221216000000 +0000, All three hosts watch a group of precocious orphans attempt save a dying Father Christmas in THE CHRISTMAS DRAGON (2014).

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

MST3K: Fugitive Alien, 19910817000000 +0000, Movie constructed from two episodes of a Japanese television show. An alien marauder becomes a fugitive from his planet Valnar's Star, then joins the Earth spaceship Bacchus 3 to fight against his former masters.

MST3K: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II, 19911116000000 +0000, Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987) while Joel and the Bots make a Captain Joe action figure and stage a "name that puppet" quiz show.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: The Characters
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E06, In part one of the complete history of MST3K, Joel and the rest of the crew discuss the show's origins and the DIY feel of the early seasons.
MST3K: Hercules, 19930617000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots have a casual day on the SOL and endure another incoherent Hercules movie (Hercules (1958)).

programme.title: Hercules Unchained
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules Unchained, S04E08, While trying to resolve a quarrel between warring brothers Eteocles and Polynices, Hercules is taken captive by Queen Omphale of Lydia.

programme.title: Hercules Against the Moon Men
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000, S04E10, A race of evil Moon aliens lands in ancient Greece, wreaking havoc for years on the city of Samar. It’s up to the mighty Hercules to end the chaos.

programme.title: Hercules And The Captive Women
programme.desc: Mystery Science Theater 3000: Hercules And The Captive Women, S04E12, The guys face off against Hercules once again as the strong man fights evil Queen Antinea to get his son back in Hercules and the Captive Women.

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: The Phantom Creeps - Chapter 3: Crashing Towers
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S02E12, The final chapter of the 1939 serial starring Bela Lugosi.
MST3K: High School Big Shot, 19941210000000 +0000, The crew fights lapsing into a depression while watching the incredibly dour High School Big Shot in which a high school loser takes part in a heist

programme.title: MST3K Shorts: Young Man's Fancy
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E24, A story sponsored by the Edison Electric Institute that encourages use of a number of home appliances.
Come Dance at My Wedding, 20090606000000 +0000, A woman (Brooke Nevin) faces opposition from her estranged father (John Schneider) when she plans to sell the family's dance studio.

Edge of the Garden, 20110514000000 +0000, Newly single Brian moves to an abandoned house in the country, where he starts communicating with a woman who lived there 50 years ago and died in mysterious circumstances. Stars Rob Estes and Sarah Manninen.

Goodnight for Justice: The Measure of a Man, 20120128000000 +0000, Circuit Judge John Goodnight reunites with old flame Callie Bluepointe and discovers her hometown is under siege by an outlaw. Goodnight is determined to bring an end to the outlaw's reign of terror once and for all.
J.L. Family Ranch, 20160101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Rancher and former sheriff John Landsburg must save his beloved family ranch.
JL Family Ranch: The Wedding Gift, 20200101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. After Rebecca's engagement, a visitor from her past comes to the ranch.
Karen Kingsbury's The Bridge, 20151206000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. The sweeping tale of Molly Callens and Ryan Kelly.

Love Locks, 20170128000000 +0000, A woman returns to Paris after 20 years and begins a journey of romance and rediscovery when she reconnects with her college boyfriend and first love. Stars Rebecca Romijn and Jerry O'Connell.

programme.title: Buried Treasures
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Nell discovers a treasure map that Bree made as a teen.

programme.title: Grand Openings
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E06, Hallmark Original Series. As the nightclub opening nears, Trace spends late nights practicing.

programme.title: All Our Yesterdays
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E07, Hallmark Original Series. Mick receives damaging information about Thomas.

programme.title: Forest Through the Trees
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E08, Hallmark Original Series. Abby and Trace talk about their past and the future during a camping getaway.

programme.title: The Royal Court
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E09, Hallmark Original Series. After his band's video goes viral, Trace receives offers.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E10, Hallmark Original Series. Mark offers Trace and his band a worldwide tour deal.

programme.title: Brain Storm
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E16, When the Atlantis team is given two weeks of vacation leave, Dr. Rodney McKay reluctantly accepts an invitation by his former rival, Malcolm Tunney, to attend a scientific demonstration that he claims will be the solution to global warming.

programme.title: Infection
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E17, The team prepares for the worst as board a Wraith hive ship over Atlantis. They're surprised to find the Wraith crew in stasis when a malfunction on the hive ship releases the remaining crew… who have been cannibalizing one another for food.

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E18, When Dr. Jennifer Keller is observed behaving very strangely, extensive testing reveals nothing abnormal. But McKay’s investigation leads him to suspect that Dr. Keller and Neela Casol, a notorious criminal, have switched consciousnesses.

programme.title: Vegas
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E19, In an alternate universe, Detective John Sheppard is with the Las Vegas Police Department and begins to investigate a strange series of murders believed to be the work of a bizarre serial killer. Has life changed or is this a dangerous Wraith plot?

programme.title: Enemy At The Gate
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E20, Puzzled over the hive ship's sudden departure, the team picks up a weak subspace signal in Wraith code. Once deciphered, their worst fears are realized. The Wraith message contains a familiar set of coordinates. The hive ship is on its way to Earth!

programme.title: Space
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E11, An alien vessel appears in Destiny’s path and launches an attack, capturing Chloe. Col. Young must use the stones again to get aboard the ship and try to rescue Chloe. He quickly realizes, however, that Chloe isn’t the only prisoner aboard.

programme.title: Divided
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E12, Suspecting an alien tracking device may be hidden somewhere aboard the Destiny, Col. Young and Lt. Scott search the ship’s hull. While distracted by the search, a group aboard the Destiny puts in action a coup that has life-threatening consequences.

programme.title: Faith
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E13, Dwindling supplies, tedious routines, and low morale continue to plague the crew of the Destiny when the ship suddenly drops out of FTL and enters the orbit of an uncharted star. But, for the first time, the countdown clock doesn’t activate!

programme.title: Human
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E14, Disregarding orders, Dr. Rush links himself to the Destiny’s computer via the neural interface chair, hoping it will reveal the code needed to control Destiny’s flight path. Learning of this, Col. Young struggles with letting Rush risk his life.

programme.title: Secrets
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E09, The Stargate project is imperiled when a reporter threatens to expose the top-secret portal. O'Neill attempts to stop him while the rest of the team tries to save Jackson's wife who has been impregnated with a Goa'uld. Is this the end of Stargate?

programme.title: Bane
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E10, A giant insect has bitten Teal'c (Christopher Judge) and soon his body will transform into a cocoon and give birth to hundreds of insect aliens. Can the SG-1 team capture one of the bugs, extract the venom and save Teal'c before it's too late?

programme.title: Tok'ra, The - Part 1
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E11, Captain Carter unwillingly becomes the host to a dying Tok'ra, a member of the resistance whose noble goal is to overthrow the evil Goa'uld empire. Now she sees through the Tok'ra's eyes, but can her visions help the SG-1 team save the Tok'ra?

programme.title: Tok'ra, The - Part 2
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E12, The Tok'ra are desperate for hosts so they can continue fighting the Goa'uld. Carter's father, who is dying of cancer, has nothing to lose by volunteering his body. But will he die during the transference...or does fate have something else in store?

programme.title: Spirits
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E13, SG-11 vanishes while negotiating the mining rights on a planet inhabited by a tribe known as the Salish. Can the SG-1 team find their lost colleagues without angering the planet's mystical spirits...or will they become their next victims?

programme.title: Touchstone
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E14, A climate-controlling touchstone is stolen from planet Madrona, causing the weather to rapidly deteriorate. And when the SG-1 team is accused of the theft, O'Neill must pursue the real thief and rescue the missing stone before Madrona perishes.

programme.title: The Fifth Race
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E15, While studying alien wall inscriptions on another planet, O'Neill peers into a viewer that unleashes ancient knowledge into his mind like computer virus. Can the SG-1 team reverse the process before his mind is completely reconfigured.

programme.title: A Matter Of Time
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S02E16, A black hole swallows the SG-10 team, and O'Neill is sent on a rescue mission. As the hole's pull grows stronger, it draws the Stargate toward it and soon threatens to destroy Earth. Will O'Neill find a way to stop this super-destructive force?

programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E270, Rescue 911 flies with a Phoenix Air Evac team. A child falls into a pool and has no pulse.

programme.title: Foot-Fault Avalanche/Harley Hugs Ball
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E347, Two pre-teenagers are buried alive during a snow avalanche. A woman is playing with her Springer Spaniel when a ball becomes lodged in the dog's throat.

programme.title: Killing Plane/Teen Car, Part 1
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E316, A pilot of a small plane crashes during icy weather. Teenagers lose control of their car and tumble down a ditch.

programme.title: Box Canyon/Garage Door
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E121, A woman fell 100 feet to canyon bottom / 5-year-old is pinned under eclectic garage door.

programme.title: Morro Bay-Car/Hockey Havoc
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E330, A woman loses control of her car and it flips upside down into a canal. A hockey player is knocked unconscious during a game.

programme.title: Slush Puppy/Kapiolani Hospital
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E339, A Golden Retriever is caught in a freezing river current. A 9-year-old boy is injured when the all-terrain vehicle he's riding flips over.

programme.title: Puerto Rico Fire
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E260, Puerto Rico's Dupont Plaza Hotel is filled with people celebrating New Years' Eve when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: Blind Hero/Babysitter Down
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E203, A sightless man realizes his apartment is on fire. A Baby sitter collapses and 5 year old calls 911.

programme.title: Gas Leak Hero/Flooded Cave
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E279, An elderly woman is overcome by gas fumes inside her home. Two men exploring a cave are swept away by floodwaters.

programme.title: Kidnapped Kids/Parachute
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E183, A driver pulls 7 year old into his car and speeds off. Skydiver hit her head against the backpack of a fellow parachutist.

programme.title: African Croc/11 Yr Old Road
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E331, A boy on a safari is attacked by an alligator while swimming. An 11-year-old takes over driving when her mother loses consciousness.

programme.title: Washer Baby/Infrared
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E280, An 18-month old accidentally falls into a washing machine. A neighbor calls 911 to report a break-in at the house next door.

programme.title: Pick Up Truck/Butane Huffing
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E360, Two children are hurt when a truck crashes into a convenience store. A 15-year old boy passes out after inhaling butane.

programme.title: Blacked-Out Driver/Self Inflicted
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E158, 911 dispatcher tries to talk woman with a loaded pistol out of committing suicide

programme.title: Dangling Skier/Alligator Alley

The Lost Wife of Robert Durst, 20250116082600 +0000, Young and wide-eyed Kathie falls in love with charming, yet quirky real estate scion Robert Durst, only to find their marriage turning stranger, darker and more disturbing as time passes.

programme.title: Message in a Bottle
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E05, Hobie overhears his divorcing parents arguing and boats away to a deserted island with two friends, only to have their boat drift away, leaving them stranded on the island with modern day pirates!

programme.title: The Sky is Falling
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E06, After their plane crashes, two robbers attempt to retrieve their suitcase full of stolen money from the ocean. Meanwhile, Mitch and Gayle go to court over custody of Hobie.

programme.title: The Drowning Pool
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E07, A wealthy older man drowns under suspicious circumstances in front of Jill Riley's tower. Jill endures the pain of losing her first victim, becoming obsessed with unraveling whether his death was an accidental drowning or murder.

programme.title: Rookie School
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E08, While housesitting for Craig and Gina, Eddie takes in a runaway whose life is threatened by her mobster boyfriend. Meanwhile, Trevor enters Baywatch rookie school to become a certified LA County lifeguard.

programme.title: Cruise Ship
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E09, Eddie warns Shauni that her new boyfriend Andrew is not a good guy. She ignores Eddie until Andrew gives her a black eye. Meanwhile, Craig and Mitch must stop an out of control party boat before it crashes into the crowded Santa Monica pier.

programme.title: Cretin of the Shallows
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E10, Several people are murdered at the beach by a mysterious man in ghoulish make-up and Eddie is knocked unconscious by what he describes as a "cretin." Eddie's report is met with skepticism until the identity of the killer is dramatically revealed.

programme.title: Shelter Me
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E11, During a tropical storm, Eddie and Shauni take refuge in the Pomeroy's loft, turning a cold night into the start of a hot romance. In the downpour, two escaped convicts shoot Garner, then break into Baywatch headquarters and take everyone hostage.

programme.title: The Reunion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E12, Craig gets jealous when Mitch reunites with his and Craig’s old flame. Meanwhile, Eddie buys a classic Mustang for cheap, only to get arrested for possession of a stolen car.

programme.title: Armored Car
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E13, Jill teams up with Trevor to win a beach volleyball tournament, but all she really wants is to beat her former lover's team. Eddie and Shauni team up to rescue a young girl trapped in an armored car that topples off the pier into the ocean.

programme.title: Home Cort
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E14, Mitch gets a surprise visit from his old, mischievous Navy S.E.A.L. buddy and ex-Baywatch lifeguard, John Cort, adding serious problems in their already complicated relationship. And Shauni and Jill fight a battle of the sexes against a shady vendor.

programme.title: We Need a Vacation
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E15, Craig, Cort, and Eddie take a road trip to Mexico, but their vacation south of the border turns ugly when they tangle with an angry American tourist. Meanwhile, Captian Thorpe becomes Mitch's uninvited house guest. Hobie develops a crush on Shauni.

programme.title: Muddy Waters
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E16, Cort and Eddie train lifeguards at a water park, but someone is vandalizing the waterslides, putting people's lives in danger. Meanwhile, Captain Thorpe wants Shauni fired for posing in a provocative calendar.

programme.title: Snake Eyes
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E17, Eddie and Cort happen upon an illegal gambling ship. Meanwhile, Mitch begins to spend more time with Hobie's English teacher – a liaison that embarrasses Hobie beyond belief.

programme.title: Eclipse
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E18, After losing his rookie partner in the mysterious rescue of what he thinks is a ghost, Eddie gets unwittingly caught up in a 70-year-old legend. Meanwhile, Hobie attempts to help a friend find a new home for her dog.

programme.title: Shark Derby
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E19, A local restaurateur puts up a $25,000 bounty for the largest shark caught during the weekend's Shark Derby he's sponsoring. To attract more sharks, he illegally chums the waters, drawing hundreds of sharks uncommonly close to shore.

programme.title: The Big Race
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E20, Cort promises to come up with $10,000 for a nursing home, but he needs Mitch and Craig's help to compete in a water-skiing race with a big cash prize. Shauni’s traumatic fear of the ocean after Jill’s death threatens her future with Baywatch.

programme.title: Old Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S01E21, Craig, Mitch, and Garner go for a weekend hang-gliding trip, but Mitch has a serious accident, and ends up facing death before the fangs of a rattlesnake! Cort reacquaints himself with a woman who has a shocking secret.
